wikitext.*:
{{Expansion}}
'''Dan Hennah''' served as the production designer for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] and [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]]. He also portrayed the [[Gerontius Took|Old Took]] in the [[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (extended edition)|extended edition]] of ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]''.

==Awards==
* [[2004]] - '''[http://www.oscars.org/ Academy Award]''', Best Art Direction-Set Decoration, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''
* [[2013]] - '''[http://www.saturnawards.org/ Saturn Award]''', Best Production Design, ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]''  
* [[2014]] - '''Saturn Award''', Best Production Design, ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''
